headline: Is Marriott International, Inc. (MAR) Among the Best Hospitality Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Hospitality Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MAR) stands against the other hospitality stocks. The hospitality industry is growing quickly and covers businesses related to lodging, dining, tourism, and other services. […]
